help-file.title: QUIT
help-file.content: Just like in real life, in the game you cannot just "quit" life. Your character must find a safe place such as an Inn or setup camp for the night. There are two commands your character can therefore use to leave the game - rent (at an Inn only) and camp. If you simply close your client and leave your character "link dead", it will remain in the game, which is obviously very dangerous, as it will then leave your character defenseless from attack.
